title: My profile says I'm a Solo player, but that isn't true.
body:
I'm almost always duo queued with my trusty lane partner.

https://i.gyazo.com/29041002a317f51c69082ed13bf53ba6.png

replies.body:
Idk, that items always... **bugs** me

http://loltracker.com/images/easyblog_shared/articles_philidia/PBE3/Zzrotportal.jpg
There's that moment when you first combine it, and instead of being full of the various component parts, you now have a void in your inventory.

Void in your inventory.
So damn clever and upvoted.
Then flame it. It's super effective.
Nah, just rock that thing. That's super-effective too.

This fucking comment chain.
Beautiful Pokemon references have been applauded - and upvoted, of course.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:74}} {{item:3512}} {{item:3060}}  13 minute inhib
0 second cancer
... You finished 2 items in 13 minutes?

I actually got Heimer yesterday and brought that build straight into ranked.

Too bad Plats are so bad they don't know how to capitalize on that pushing advantage. Also our bot lane lost to an AP Malph + Braum lane...

Ahh {{item:3060}} {{item:3512}}  , my only true friends on the rift. Nobody flames you for getting CS when they can't see it, and the sneaky split push
http://66.media.tumblr.com/f465bc8dab1fc71d6025eca52c128563/tumblr_nsmu97BvJQ1tqu5dto1_400.gif
Upvoted because of the Doritos
Fucking genius. I gotta do this.
Yep zz is so much better than it's sister ohmwreker.

Ohm... who?

Is that a DOTA thing?
At least someone bought ohmwrecker in lcs today
http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/the-photoshop-is-strong-in-this-one.jpg
Many a {{item:3512}} buyer have experienced the true friendship that is a 700 stack {{champion:75}} at 15 minutes. He gives great hugs in case you didn't know.
Oh lord. This x 1000. I usually just stand beside the portal and Just Q. 100 stacks ezpz.
{{champion:75}} or {{champion:45}}  against {{item:3512}}  = free stacks baby!

At least you can be sure it won't flame you.
{{item:3751}}  used to be my duo partner for jugle but the flame was unbearable for {{champion:106}} jungle
It only counts if you win games so you can que w/ others and lose all you want and it won't change your badge.
mine says im motly a dynamic player when i mianly play solo
The one for dynamic doesn't really mean "mostly dynamic", you just need an overwhelming majority as solo to get the solo icon and it's easy to lose it by doing occasional premade groups.
i dont duo in ranked though. thats the thing.

{{item:3512}} is my best friend. He's has never let me down, saved my life more times than I care to count and even got me a few kills before :p

Makes me sad when I play a champ that shouldn't build it. (Though I do replace it as my defensive item more times than I should >.>)
Lol
ok?

i thought u left?

dang it
